name: Into The War (itch) (bungusDEV)
description:
Drop right Into the war!

In this FPS shooter you'll have 3 different gamemodes:

Story

Singleplayer

Multiplayer

-------------------

*Story coming soon*

It's 2022. Russia has just attacked Ukraine. 

You are a father of 3, living in Kyiv, but when your son gets captured, you gotta venture into russian military bases by yourself.

--------------------

 Multiplayer/Lan  coming soon.

Join early access and test brand new features, play brand new maps, and a whole lot more!

Beta features:

- Multiple guns

-New levels every week

-Map maker *coming soon*

-Realistic graphics

-Vehicles *coming soon*

Please note that the game is in an early beta*

full game will cost 10 USD on steam. After release, for those who bought will get everything for free including story dlcs.
